thread.title: 20 years ago: Utes stage miracle rally vs. Air Force
thread.title_full: 20 years ago: Utes stage miracle rally vs. Air Force

title: 20 years ago: Utes stage miracle rally vs. Air Force
text:
Published: Sunday, Oct. 18 2015 2:00 p.m. MDT Updated: 4 hours ago Sunday morning quarterback: Utah-Arizona State 
Editor's note: Every Sunday, the Deseret News will take a quick look back into our archives . 
Down 21-7 to Air Force, all Utah needed were a couple of 50-yard passes, an onsides kick, a two-point conversion all in less than a minute to earn the victory. And, miracle of miracles, it happened. 
The Utes scored two touchdowns in a 10-second span in the final minute to stun the Falcons 22-21 and hurt Air Forces WAC title hopes. Mike Fouts threw a 17-yard scoring strike to Rocky Henry with 41 seconds left and a 50-yarder to Kevin Dyson with 31 seconds remaining.
